original_text: After this, Acsah told Othniel that they should ask her father to give them some land. She went to see her father, Caleb. As she got off her donkey, Caleb asked her, ‘What would you like me to do for you?’
korean_text: 악사가 출가할 때에 그에게 청하여 자기 아버지에게 밭을 구하자 하고 나귀에서 내리매 갈렙이 그에게 묻되 네가 무엇을 원하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: that they should ask her father
She went to see her father, Caleb.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자신의 아버지 갈렙을 만나러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: As she got off her donkey,
'What would you like me to do for you?'
